content.text:
# Indian Telly Award for Fan Favorite Actress

| year          = 2002
| holder        = Rupali Ganguly for Anupamaa
| website       = [http://www.indiantellyawards.com Indian Telly Awards]
}}
Indian Telly Award for Fan Favorite Actress is an award given as a part of the annual Indian Telly Awards. The award is voted for by the fans.
Superlatives
